traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. he never insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around him. he also never judges people by their appearance. his agreeableness also makes him more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if his mood is low.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy has cat-like reflexes, and excels at evading attacks.
traits.name: deftlydodger

traits.description: Timmy is not very good at getting out of the way of blows.
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: bodymodder

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will learn new skills slightly faster than other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description:
Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
(Humanoid Alien Races)
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description:
Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
(Humanoid Alien Races)
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description:
Timmy enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. he will prefer fishing above other activities.
(Vanilla Fishing Expanded)
traits.name: fisherman

traits.description:
Timmy tends to occasionally allow their mind to drift, even in the middle of working.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: absent-minded

traits.description:
Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description:
Timmy strives for perfection in his work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description:
While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and he will try to hide or run as a first priority.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: coward

traits.description:
Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: brave

traits.description:
Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy all too often, mostly due to uncoordinated tripping or falling.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description:
Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description:
Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description:
A bomb could go off next to Timmy while they sleep and they'd continue to do so. They can't be bothered to defend the colony mid catnap, either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description:
Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: neat

traits.description:
Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: slob

traits.description:
Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. he will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description:
Timmy has never felt nausea in his life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to him.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description:
Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. he will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: animallover

traits.description:
Timmy believes deeply in human superiority. Killing animals will please them and the colony losing an animal is a cherry on top according to them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description:
Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description:
Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: rebel

traits.description:
Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: submissive

traits.description:
Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description:
Whether by past trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. They may randomly punch or attack mechanical devices and refuse to learn or research anything about them. They also love killing mechanoids.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: technophobe

traits.description:
Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description:
Timmy has hindered mental capacities. While slow to learn and hard to speak with, they tend to be much happier naturally.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: dunce

traits.description:
Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description:
Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: snob

traits.description:
Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for him.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description:
Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: anxious

traits.description:
No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. he will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description:
Timmy refuses to give their body to anybody but their spouse and would never fathom initiating a divorce. They also hate being nude much more than other pawns.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: prude

traits.description:
An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description:
Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: catperson

traits.description:
Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description:
Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description:
Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: menagerist

traits.description:
The sea calls to Timmy. he feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description:
The mountains call to Timmy. he feels happier just being near a large mountain.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description:
Timmy has a twisted secret. he treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description:
Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description:
Timmy is compulsed to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: kleptomaniac

traits.description:
Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: stoner

traits.description:
Alcohol culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores booze and would rather die before giving it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: lush

traits.description:
Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description:
Timmy is never really asleep or awake. he is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description:
Timmy has grown tired of the world and needs to be constantly distracted to stop dark thoughts. his bleak personality is a big downer and therefore it is very hard to become friends with them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: worldweary

traits.description:
Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description:
Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description:
Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: academian

traits.description:
Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: groundbreaker

traits.description:
In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: gastronomist

traits.description:
Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description:
Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and he will likely convince you if given the chance.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description:
Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description:
Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description:
Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: schizoid

traits.description:
Timmy loves beautiful things, and really cares about how his enviroment looks.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: aesthete

traits.description:
Timmy loves animals. he doesn't feel quite the same about people, though.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: animalaficionado

traits.description:
Timmy just isn't an "animal person." he doesn't like animals, and for the record, they don't seem to much like him, either.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: animalabhorrent

traits.description:
Timmy loved playing with construction toys as a child, and still enjoys the thrill of "putting things together." But he tends to be a bit lost without clear instructions to follow.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: builder

traits.description:
Timmy enjoys preparing meat for cooking. his butchering speed is greatly increased, but only if he's dealing with animal corpses. he's terrible with mechanoids.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: butcher

traits.description:
Timmy is claustrophobic. he is terrified of tight spaces, and thus is not a very competent miner.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: claustrophobic

traits.description:
Timmy loves colder temperatures. he'll complain less than others when it's chilly, but will whine more when it's hot.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: coldlover

traits.description:
Timmy can sleep through anything.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: deepsleeper

traits.description:
Timmy is a bit of a dunce, and learns at a slower rate than others.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: dullard

traits.description:
Timmy has a passion for food preparation. his culinary creations are quite tasty, but he tends to take a while getting them "just right."
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: gourmet

traits.description:
Timmy loves the heat. he'll complain less than others when it's hot, but will whine more when it's cold.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: heatlover

traits.description:
he means well, but Timmy is uncoordinated, and just not very good at any sort of skilled labor.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: inept

traits.description:
Timmy is unusually coordinated, and good at most any sort of skilled labor.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: coordinated

traits.description:
Timmy has an exceptionally high tolerance for pain. he is unlikely to be immobilized by it.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: unstoppable

traits.description:
Timmy has a high tolerance for pain.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: ironman

traits.description:
Timmy will become immobilized by pain more quickly than most.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: lowpaintolerance

traits.description:
Strange new ideas just appear in Timmy's mind. Researching new technologies comes easily to him, but he always seems distracted.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: inventor

traits.description:
Timmy has a hard time seeing things clearly unless they are right in front of them.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: cranialnervepalsy

traits.description:
Timmy has a keen eye, and can quickly spot targets.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: eagle-eyed

traits.description:
Timmy is fastidious to a fault.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: neatfreak

traits.description:
Timmy picks at his food, taking extra time to finish his meals.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: nibbler

traits.description:
Timmy devours his meals much faster than others.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: glutton

traits.description:
Timmy is really afraid of the dark.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: nyctophobe

traits.description:
Timmy doesn't fear the dark at all.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: nyctophile

traits.description:
Timmy refuses to accept less than his best in any endeavor, no matter how long it takes. he's less likely to fail when doing something, but he works slowly.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: idealist

traits.description:
Even when they have the best of intentions, some people just aren't cut out for medicine. Timmy is one of those people.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: poormedic

traits.description:
Timmy seems to have a knack for medical work. Patients in his care will likely fare well.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: skilledmedic

traits.description:
Timmy has a natural aptitude for medical work. Between his steady, skilled hands and his inspiring bedside manner, patients in his care will have little to fear.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: mastermedic

traits.description:
Timmy enjoys working with rocks. his mining speed is increased, but his lack of interest in other areas slows him down when doing other jobs. And he hates working with plants.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: rockhound

traits.description:
Timmy is a modern-day Da Vinci, with a creative mind that can grasp new ideas almost effortlessly. But he's almost painfully slow when it comes to doing actual physical work.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: savant

traits.description:
Timmy has always picked up skills pretty quickly.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: decentlearner

traits.description:
Timmy just can't seem to help but get taken advantage of while trading. he'll pay more than he should, and still think that he got a good deal. 
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: sucker

traits.description:
Timmy likes to haggle, and isn't bad at it. he tends to get better prices than most people.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: haggler

traits.description:
Timmy always gets the best deals.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: mastertrader

traits.description:
Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description:
Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description:
Timmy knows how to handle a firearm, and can shoot both quickly and accurately.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: deadshot

traits.description:
Subtlety? Diplomacy? Timmy barely even understands the meaning of the words.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: uncouth

traits.description:
Timmy knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: diplomat

traits.description:
Timmy has such a way with words that he always manages to cool down a tense situation. he could talk for days and people would still listen.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: masterdiplomat

traits.description:
Timmy is especially vulnerable to diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: weakconstitution

traits.description:
Timmy's body is stronger than normal against diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: strongconstitution

traits.description:
Timmy is a terrible gardener. The only thing he seems able to grow is weeds.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: brownthumb

traits.description:
Timmy is a great gardener. The only thing he wants is a greener world.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description:
Either the body or mind of Timmy is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.
(Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures)

data.mod: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

traits.name: elder

traits.description:
A strict principle of nonviolence which applies to all living things.
(Alpha Memes)
traits.name: vowofnonviolence

traits.description:
Timmy is the descendant of a designer mate. Though most of his ancestral traits are diluted, he is still extremely beautiful and cheerful.
(Xenohumans - Anthromorphs)
traits.name: designerheritage

traits.description:
Timmy dislikes children.
(Children, school and learning)
traits.name: dislikeschildren

traits.description:
Timmy is the child of a werewolf and will first transfrom when coming of age.
(Children, school and learning)
traits.name: werewolf-child

traits.description:
Timmy has been born in the colony.
(Children, school and learning)
traits.name: naturalborncolony-child

traits.description:
Timmy is too young to work.
(Children, school and learning)
traits.name: tooyoungtowork

traits.description:
Timmy's heart has innocence. Maybe it's because you've never experienced a tough world before.
he will be more traumatized by violent acts such as cannibalism, organ harvesting and sight of dead bodies.
(Babies and Children (1.3))
traits.name: innocence

traits.description:
Timmy awakened with a new type. he is amazing at dodging, and get +5 points for melee and shooting. 
(Babies and Children (1.3))
traits.name: newtype

traits.description:
Timmy is entombed in a warcasket. No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain. Because of how bulky the armor is and how much energy it takes to use it, Timmy is not capable of doing any work.
(Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates)
traits.name: warcasket

traits.description:
Timmy was entombed in a warcasket, and then brutally pulled out of one. The neural and nerve damage from being unplugged is so severe that Timmy is in constant, agonizing pain and can barely assemble his thoughts. Only installing Timmy back in a warcasket can cure the symptoms.
(Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates)
traits.name: shellcasket

traits.description:
Timmy is abnormally receptive to the ebb and flow of mana, he will gain mana 40% faster than normal but his maximum mana capacity is reduced by 20.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: arcaneconduit

traits.description:
Timmy has an increased resistance to the ebb and flow of mana which allows him to hold an additional 40 mana, but reduces his mana regeneration by 20%.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: manawell

traits.description:
Timmy excels at combat arts and is able to execute combat maneuvers 40% more frequently, however, his talent has fostered an arrogant attitude that reduces his experience gain by 25% and causes other fighters to dislike him.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: boundless

traits.description:
Timmy is a descendant of fae folk and has a natural connection to the arcane. his arcane resistance is reduced by 40% but mana regeneration and maximum mana is increased by 20%. Spell costs are reduced by 10%.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: faeblood

traits.description:
Timmy is a descendant of giants - endowed with with great strength and stamina, though slow to recover. his max stamina is increased by 80%, but stamina regeneration is reduced by 40%. Any attack made while using a melee weapon, or unarmed, deals an additional 25% damage.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: giantsblood

traits.description:
Timmy is blessed by magic, able to harness its power without suffering the full side-effects. Psychic sensitivity is increased by 50% and any magic ability used only incurs half the normal arcane weakness.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: enlightened

traits.description:
Timmy is cursed by magic - tormented by the constant, burning rush of power through his being, and can only gain relief by expending arcane energy. Timmy will slowly accumulate arcane weakness up until he would become catatonic, and may become catatonic at any point while at this threshold. Using magical abilities that would normally incur arcane weakness will instead proportionally reduce arcane weakness, as well as the effects of the curse.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: cursed

traits.description:
Timmy has accepted that death is another part of life and doesn't get upset when learning about a dead ally or seeing one of the undead.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: unaffectedbydeath

traits.description:
Timmy has been reanimated as an undead.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: undead

traits.description:
Timmy has a magical gift. he can harness this gift to become a mage by studying the mysterious secrets within an arcane script.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: magicallygifted

traits.description:
Timmy is an empath, able to feel and manipulate the emotions of those around him. his's abilities are tied to magic, but have affected him on a more innate level. However, with training, Timmy can still become an adept magic user. For better or worse, empath's have a very strong presence and can easily read the presence of others; the effectiveness of their abilities are closely tied to their aptitude for overcoming another's defenses.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: empath

traits.description:
Timmy is a wanderer; an outcast, half-breed mage class frequently dubbed a hedge-mage. his carefree personality has kept his from developing class abilities. Instead, he has learned to improve on a vast number of utility abilities that allow him to adapt to any situation.
		
Wanderers prefer the open road and gain a mood boost for being in a caravan. Caravans with a wanderer will ignore the movement penalties of any world tile. However, their wanderlust will cause them to suffer a mood penalty for remaining at a colony for too long.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: wanderer

traits.description:
Timmy is attuned with the elements of fire.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: firemage

traits.description:
Timmy is attuned with the elements of water.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: icemage

traits.description:
Timmy is attuned with the elements of lightning.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: lightningmage

traits.description:
Timmy is attuned with arcane forces, interacting directly with raw arcane power to move matter and energy at will.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: arcanemage

traits.description:
Timmy is attuned with the forces of nature.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: druid

traits.description:
Timmy has been bestowed with divine might and has sworn to uphold justice wherever he stands.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: paladin

traits.description:
Timmy is able to summon beings and materialize objects from other planes of existence.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: summoner

traits.description:
Timmy is attuned with the forces of death.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: necromancer

traits.description:
Timmy has transformed into a lich, forsaking life in exchange for an power and an immortal existence. he disdains menial taks, choosing to employ undead for trivial matters.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: lich

traits.description:
Timmy is attuned with the forces of life and healing and has taken a vow against harming others.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: priest

traits.description:
Timmy is a natural entertainer, able to lighten the mood and lift the spirits of everyone around him.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: entertainer

traits.description:
Timmy is a performer; expanding on natural talent, he has begun to take an conscious role to improve the mood of other colonists.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: performer

traits.description:
Everyone loves being around Timmy. he has talent, wit and skill in many forms of entertainment and is able to make a personal connection with almost everyone.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: minstrel

traits.description:
Timmy is a master entertainer. Sharp wit, deft hands, and dry humor are his weapons, and he is a master of all his weapons.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: bard

traits.description:
Timmy has a strange genetic strain that grants her enhanced physical attributes. She is also extremely attractive with an exotic facial structure that captures the eye. A succubus is more likely to exploit her physical advantages and have others do her work for her. his succubus charm has its disadvantages and can cause some to become jealous and even despise him.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: succubus

traits.description:
Timmy is a Warlock - able to manifest physical and demonic forces using his unique access to arcane power. The warlock shares the same genetic mixture as a succubus, but as a male, he is affected with mental enhancements that include clairvoyance and telekineses. The warlock can occasionally affect the outcome of a social interaction using their mental capabilities, regardless of how the interaction actually occurred.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: warlock

traits.description:
Timmy is attuned with the earth and natural order, drawing power from the physical realm and intertwining it with arcane energy. he is capable of reinforcing physical elements, and bending them, as he needs.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: geomancer

traits.description:
Timmy has learned to see magic and science as two parts of the same force and is able to use arcane power to interface directly with components of technology. he is capable of manipulating objects with advanced mechanics, electronics, or computing it to achieve his goals, but has difficulty interacting with biological systems.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: technomancer

traits.description:
Timmy is a blood mage and has consigned to the dark art of manipulating the life blood of living things as a means of increasing his power.

As a blood mage, Timmy has learned to control the life force within and command it to his will. his connection to life makes it easier to associate with other living things, but doesn't appreciate effort without immediate results.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: bloodmage

traits.description:
Timmy is an enchanter, attuned to the composition of matter and materials. he can manipulate matter to his will, frequently in unnatural ways, and his powers of transmutation can be permanent when sufficient effort is applied.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: enchanter

traits.description:
Timmy is a chronomancer. Through arcane sight, he is able to view reality as it once was and as it could be, and can manipulate objects between those realities.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: chronomancer

traits.description:
Timmy has rejected all predefined magic paths and refuses to attribute objective reality in his search for power; there are no truths, all magic is permitted. This tradition has enabled Timmy to learn any type of magic, although he will never master any.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: chaosmage

traits.description:
Timmy is a half-breed demon with an affinity for shadow magic. he has developed his unique talents through combat training and physical conditioning making him the perfect assassin.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: shadow

traits.description:
Timmy is a brightmage, able to harness the powers of light to purge evil. he approaches any task with an unrivaled fervor that usually places him at the forefront. Being a Brightmage introduces a dependency on the sun and light, because of this, Timmy has developed an intense hatred for shadowy and dark caricatures.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: brightmage

traits.description:
Shamans take a more harmonious approach to arcane powers than most mages, choosing to pursue a path that works with the ebb and flow of magic to offset or enhance the natural order. Timmy is kin to the spirit realm and more attuned to nature and its elements.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: shaman

traits.description:
Golemancers prefer to weave their magic through powerful runes and sigils that are able to transfer purpose into an object. Timmy is no exception; he can create runes that enhance basic mechanics, alter chemicals in biological matter, and animate mundane material into life-like, monstrous creatures. Golemancers are most effective when channeling their magic through symbols and find it more difficult to convert mana to energy directly but are also have higher arcane resistances. Most golemancers tend to find rocks more interesting than people and have little concern for cleanliness.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: golemancer

traits.description:
Timmy is physically adept and has potential to learn special combat forms.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: physicallyadept

traits.description:
Timmy is a wayfarer; an self-disciplined fighter that excels at tricks and dirty fighting. his carefree personality has kept him from developing class abilities. Instead, he has learned to improve a vast number of utility abilities that allow him to adapt to any situation.

Wayfarers prefer the open road and will gain a mood boost for being in a caravan, and any caravan with a wayfarer will travel 25% faster. However, wayfarers will suffer a mood penalty if they remain at colony for too long.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: wayfarer

traits.description:
Timmy is an apothecary, trained in the preparation of medicines, balms, tinctures and drugs. his profession exhibits strict discipline and dedication, and he has learned to apply his discipline to more generic, physical skills. With training, he can become capable in many combat techniques to augment his skill in herbs.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: apothecary

traits.description:
Timmy has learned how to train the Gladiator combat style.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: gladiator

traits.description:
Timmy is a trained woodsman; preferring the silence and lethality of a bow and armed with field-craft and cunning, he is prepared to defend his land from invaders.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: woodsman

traits.description:
Timmy is a hunter; he employs field-craft, cunning, and skill with a bow to defend his land from invaders.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: hunter

traits.description:
Timmy is a scout; comfortable in the wilds, and relied upon to be the eyes and ears of a colony. he employs expertise in field-craft, cunning, and the bow to defend his land from invaders.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: scout

traits.description:
Timmy is a ranger; master of the wilds.  he is a master of his craft and defender of his land.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: ranger

traits.description:
Timmy has trained to become a sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Training to become a sniper has caused some colonists to be uncomfortable around him, not that he cares.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: sharpshooter

traits.description:
Timmy has trained to become a sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Becoming a sniper has caused him to become distanced from other colonists and somewhat unapproachable, not that he cares.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: sniper

traits.description:
Timmy is a master sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Being a sniper has made him avoid other colonists, not that they care.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: mastersniper

traits.description:
Timmy is a legendary sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat.  Other colonists avoid eye contact and whisper in corners about how dangerous he is and that suits him just fine.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: legendarysniper

traits.description:
Timmy is training to become a master of the blade and excels at fighting in melee combat.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: bladesman

traits.description:
Timmy has trained to become a sword master, dangerously skilled in melee combat.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: blademaster

traits.description:
Timmy is a blade dancer, highly skilled in melee combat.  Watching him fight is like watching a dance, every action precise and flawless as it flows from one form into another.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: bladedancer

traits.description:
Timmy has become a legend, his skill in melee combat is is known across the world. his skill in combat makes it look as if each movement, each strike, is merely a stitch in a tapestry that depicts his victory.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: legendarybladedancer

traits.description:
Timmy is a master of disguise and imitation; able to manipulate and capture the muscle and mental actions of another and release it as their own.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: faceless

traits.description:
Timmy is a Psionic - able to manifest mental willpower into raw energy without the use of a psychic amplifier. he is able to project psionic energy but finds it easier and more efficient to apply it as an extension of his body. For this reason, he prefers to be free of encumbering weapons when manifesting psionic energy.

Timmy has become less social since developing psionic powers, preferring to be unhindered by other pawns.

*The regeneration rate of psionic energy is based on psychic sensitivity - reducing sensitivity to 0 will prevent psionic energy from regenerating.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: psionic

traits.description:
Timmy is a Death Knight - harbinger of doom and a representative of the ever approaching inevitability of death and decay. his solemn attitude makes most pawns uneasy and even fewer approve of his methods.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: deathknight

traits.description:
Timmy is a Monk, dedicated to mastering Chi - the energy that connects all life in the universe. he harnesses Chi to create magical effects and exceed his physical capabilities. Timmy is also able to disrupt the Chi in others, affecting their command over spells and abilities.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: monk

traits.description:
As a Commander, Timmy exhibits a charismatic personality and stalwart presence that makes other pawns want to follow his lead. Commander's utilize the weight of their presence to inspire nearby pawns, and when that's not enough, they can issue orders that drive their followers to victory. Because Timmy is used to everyone doing his bidding, he considers menial tasks beneath his status, and is generally a lackluster worker.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: commander

traits.description:
Timmy is a highly trained Soldier, specializing in pistol, shotgun, or rifle weapons. his weapon specialization is augmented by a standard set of combat training. Super Soldiers are trained to be aggressive and consider violence the natural solution to any argument.
(A RimWorld of Magic)
traits.name: supersoldier

traits.description:
Timmy is a member of a hivemind
(The Human Hive)
traits.name: hivemind

traits.description:
Timmy spent his entire life among trees and wild animals. It definitely changed his behavior. Timmy won't be upset if he eats raw food without a table. he doesn't care about sleeping on the floor, outside or having damaged clothes, although he prefers to wear at least something.
(Elders Faction)
traits.name: inharmonywithnature

traits.description:
Timmy has always loved ash storms. The feeling of ash slowly wearing down skin, burning the sinuses and filling unexpected holes. he gets unreasonably happy whenever he is outside in one.
(MorrowRim)
traits.name: ashlover

traits.description:
Timmy has mastered the art of breathing during an ash storm, and no longer suffers buildup during one. Though this doesn't meant he enjoys being outside in them.
(MorrowRim)
traits.name: ashbreather

traits.description:
NAME is an robot. As a robot HE is a bit faster and not really sensible for psychic phenomena.
(Misc. Robots)
traits.name: robot

traits.description:
In a dream Timmy was greeted by the god of the Sixth House. Ever since then the bells of the Sixth House quitely ring in his ears.
(MorrowRim - The Sixth House)
traits.name: touchedbydagothur

traits.description:
Timmy could be a shapeshifter that blends forms between man and wolf. When a special moon rises, he may have his first horrific transformation, or something else may happen...
(Rim of Madness - Werewolves)
traits.name: werewolf(?)

traits.description:
Timmy is unknowingly a shapeshifter that blends forms between man and wolf. When a special moon rises, he will have his first horrific transformation.
(Rim of Madness - Werewolves)
traits.name: werewolf(unblooded)

traits.description:
Timmy is a shapeshifter that blends its form with that of a wolf.
(Rim of Madness - Werewolves)
traits.name: werewolf

traits.description:
Having sworn a blood oath to their clan in good faith, Timmy is a shapeshifter that blends his form with that of a wolf, and cannot be recruited.
(Rim of Madness - Werewolves)
traits.name: werewolf(sworn)

traits.description:
Timmy is a genetic abberation known as the Metis. Somewhere in his genetic line, a werewolf mated with a werewolf and forever corrupted their werewolf line. This Werewolf can only transform into the Metis form.
(Rim of Madness - Werewolves)
traits.name: werewolf(metis)

traits.description:
Timmy has made an unbreakable contract. he will return from the dead to serve the King in Yellow that rules the lost city of Carcosa.
(Call of Cthulhu - Cults)
traits.name: oathtaker

traits.description:
Timmy has risen from the dead to serve once again.
(Call of Cthulhu - Cults)
traits.name: reanimated

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic avian, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: avianmorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic bovine, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: bovinemorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic canine, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: caninemorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic cervine, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: cervinemorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic dragon, but is otherwise identical to the average human. They are exceedingly rare due to the extensive and expensive modifications made to their physiology.
races.name: dragomorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic feline, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: felinemorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic hyena, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: gnollmorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic lapine, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: lagomorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic fox, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: Vulpinemorph

races.description:
A baseline trenchcat, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-TrenchCat planets. A nocturnal mammalian humanoid feline race. They have recently joined the Callistan Dominion.
(Trench Cats Renewal)
races.name: trenchcat

races.description:
A bloodthirsty vulpine near-human.
(Revia Race)
races.name: Revia

races.description:
A dangerous, bloodlusty race of humanoid avians. Harpies constantly fight among themselves, hindering any major progress among their own. Their overwhelming bloodlust is hard to satisfy, but that also means they are naturally born fighters. Their razor-sharp claws and deadly lightning attacks make them a formidable foe, even if unarmed - not that harpies can wield weapons effectively.

Good at: Melee, Ranged without weapon, Enduring Pain, Running, Flying, Looking beautiful
Bad at: Using weapons (they can't), Carrying, Not constantly fighting
((SYR) Harpy)
races.name: harpy

races.description:
The Naga are a technologically advanced race without a functional goverment or law enforcement since their homeworld has become inhabitable.  This means they can be found mostly on space stations and ships and occassionally on Rimworlds as well.

They tend to work as mercenaries for the highest bidder and offer their superior skills with guns. Not just as excellent shooters, but also as weapon manufacturers. Their plasma technology is only rivaled by the charge weapons of glitterworlds. Naga are also known for their regenerative abilities and proficiency at disassembling mechanoids.

Despite this their way of life does not go well with others and thus they struggle to find allies among other races.

Good at: Shooting, Butchering, Mechanoid Disassembly, Psychics, Quality Crafting/Construction
Bad at: Melee, Plants, Animals, Enduring Pain
((SYR) Naga)
races.name: naga

races.description:
A large, graceful humanoid creature, with long white fur, a large sharp horn and short simple tail. Their striking resemblance to Thrumbos gave them their name and leaves no doubt to where this race might have originated from.

While generally peaceful they make excellent melee fighters, thanks to their resilent hide and razor sharp horn. Thrumkin live in harmony with nature and know more about plants and animals than most advanced cultures, at least on the planet they are living on.

They are not particularly skilled when it comes to building tools and using them, neither are their structures more than simple protection from the elements.

Good at: Melee, Plants, Animals, General Labor, Absorbing Damage
Bad at: Shooting, Quality Crafting/Construction, Drug Production, Research, Trading, Cooking, Not eating your entire supplies of food
((SYR) Thrumkin)
races.name: thrumkin

races.description:
The Queen and most important member of any Hive
(The Human Hive)
races.name: Hive Queen

races.description:
A small creature, about half the size of a normal human, and very weak. They are, however, very cheap and easy to maintain
(The Human Hive)
races.name: Hivelet

races.description:
A standard, baseline Hive creature. Very similar to a human
(The Human Hive)
races.name: Hiveling

races.description:
Something went wrong when creating this creature, and now its filled with volitile chemicals, which cause this creature to explode when it dies. They also have a faster move speed than regular hivelings, making for perfect suicide units. However, due to being full of toxic chemicals, they are fragile, get ill easily and dont heal very fast.
(The Human Hive)
races.name: Boomlet

races.description:
Something went wrong when creating this creature, and now its filled with volitile chemicals, which cause this creature to explode when it dies. They also have a faster move speed than regular hivelings, making for perfect suicide units. However, due to being full of toxic chemicals, they are fragile, get ill easily and dont heal very fast.
(The Human Hive)
races.name: Nukelet

races.description:
Quickly made unstable violet creatures, unable to eat and will easily starve, causing an explosion upon death
(The Human Hive)
races.name: Unstablet

races.description:
By augmenting a hiveling at an early stage with steel and plasteel, it is tranformed into an exceptionally deadly Warriorling
(The Human Hive)
races.name: Warriorling

races.description:
A race of humanlike robots which are mostly female in model variety.

The origins of these machines are mostly unknown. Some speculate they are escapees from a civilization which used them for labor and some just suggest they are outdated pleasure machines which got dumped by a passing space freighter.

By design by their previous masters they are weak physically but their raw fortitude is enough to make up for it. Beware of their biological reactor and capacitors violently exploding, if they die by overheating.
(Androids)
races.name: Android

races.description:
A race of rudimentary humanlike worker robots.

Usually found toiling around in colonies around the rim which got a resident tinkerer.

Not capable of sapience, however their relative cheap cost and ability to work around the clock make them valuable workers.
(Androids)
races.name: Droid

races.description:
A race of rudimentary humanlike warrior robots.

Usually found guarding the homes of the wealthy and offices of mega corporations. They show no mercy upon targets who fail to identify themselves. Are traditionally armed with miniguns and core launchers.
(Androids)
races.name: Battledroid

races.description:
A race of spacer-tech humanlike worker robots.

Usually found toiling around in colonies around the rim which got a resident tinkerer.Not capable of sapience making them perfect for colony tasks. 

Advanced droids are much better than their outdated models in every way. 

Droids are not born and must be created.
(Androids Expanded)
races.name: Advanced droid

races.description:
A race of spacer-tech humanlike warrior robots.

Installed into military bases and highly sensitive areas. They show no mercy upon targets who fail to identify themselves. Are traditionally armed with miniguns and core launchers.

Advanced droids are much better than their outdated models in every way. Wardroids possess four arms, each of which is highly deadly. Humans beware: bring an army to defeat this model.

Droids are not born and must be created.
(Androids Expanded)
races.name: Wardroid

races.description:
Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This device is masterful in building & mining, but is unable to do much else. Cannot fight.
(Androids Expanded)
races.name: engineer

races.description:
Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This device is masterful in tasks relating to food & farming. It's designed to ensure everyone is fed and the kitchen is stocked.

This drone is unable to do combat nor any other skilled jobs.
(Androids Expanded)
races.name: chef

races.description:
Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This drone is highly capable in medicine, and is able to take care of most typical injuries.
(Androids Expanded)
races.name: medic

races.description:
Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This device is masterful in tasks relating to fabrication and smithing, but is unable to do much else. Cannot fight.
(Androids Expanded Assembly Drone)
races.name: assembly

races.description:
Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This device is masterful in tasks relating to hauling and transportation of goods by caravan, but is unable to do much else. Cannot fight.
(Androids Expanded Transport Drone)
races.name: transport

races.description:
Small single use drone built in short time. Only good for fighting large fires.
(Androids Expanded: Firefighter Drone)
races.name: dum-e

races.description:
Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This device is masterful in Ranching, but is unable to do much else.
(Androids Expanded: Rancher Drone)
races.name: rancher

races.description:
Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This device is equipped with a basic AI that allows it to research, but is unable to do much else.
(Androids Expanded: Think Tank)
races.name: think tank

races.description:
Small logistics drone only capable of moving materials fro A to B.
((JWL) Logistics Drone)
races.name: Logi

races.description:
A zombie
(Zombieland)
races.name: Zombie

races.description:
The Renamon race is a Digital-Animal Hybrid vessel by injecting data indexes to form the appearance of a fox.
Its slender, tall appearance excels in combat when faced with enemies of similar size, with various fighting arts that use its speed and agility for quick attacks.
Being a stoic combination of Holo-Matrix and Nanites, Renamon are usually calm, cool, and collected, and don't lose their composure in most situations.
(Ranamon Race Pack)
races.name: Renamon

races.description:
The Rakkle is an artificial species created by humans by improving reptile native life found on a planet in the middle of the system.
(Rakkle 1.3 (unofficial update))
races.name: Rakkle

races.description:
A baseline orassan, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Orassia planets. A mammalian humanoid feline race. Evolving in cold caves and life on space ships make it so they don't mind the dark or being inside for long periods of time.
(Orassans)
races.name: orassan

races.description:
A hybrid with DNA from a human and an orassan. Typically created through careful genetic engineering in a lab, or the "natural" way from individuals with closely regulated gene mods, these hybrids combine some of the best traits from their parent species. The particular traits and physical characteristics that are being inherited are typically chosen by the parents having the child, but they almost always have two feline ears and a feline tail, both with fur sharing the same color as the hair on their head.
(Orassans)
races.name: neko

races.description:
the Marvelous gift of glitterworld bionics. Humanoid with cat ears and tail.
(Nyaron race)
races.name: Nyaron

races.description:
A humanoid race living in cities under the sea. Having traits similar to sea creatures, their blood contains substances that can be used for various medical uses.

Descendants of glitterworld explorers who settled in the deep sea, generations of body modifications has led to their current form. Spreading far and wide into the rim, they built many cities and prospered. Until now.
(Moyo-From the depth)
races.name: Moyo

races.description:
A subspecies of the Moyo race, usually babies born after a Moyo is fertilized by a creature infected with the deep-sea virus. And because the symbiotic virus affects, most of them have strange personalities, but not intrinsically bad.
(Moyo-Light in the Abyss)
races.name: Red Moyo

races.description:
Inhabitants of lunar cities that carry the genes of rabbits, the rabbie excel at waging war and constructing mega-cities. They travel the galaxy in search of celestial bodies with planetarium; a drug that the rabbie population has been reliant on for survival since the begining of their history. It is believed they originally came from another galaxy, but have sinced lost the technology and have been cut off from their home galaxy.
(Rabbie The Moonrabbit race)
races.name: Rabbie

races.description:
A tribe of rabbit-like humanoids. They are small and weak, but have powerful legs.
        
        Small bodies leave them roughly 15% weaker in nearly all respects
        Less resistant to cold temperatures
        Over 40% faster running speed
        Generally fine-featured and attractive
        Somewhat Neurotic
(Bun Race)
races.name: Bun

races.description:
Whether due to scientific experimentation, occult interference, or comic fluke, these are poor souls for whom death has been abjured.
(Call of Cthulhu - Cults)
races.name: reanimated corpse

races.description:
Sharing biological features similar to fungus, amphibians, and plantlike organisms, the five-sided barrel-shaped entities referred to simply as the Elder Things are hardy creatures that can survive in most temperatures, enter trance-like sleep nearly indefinitely, survive deep space flight, and aside from suffering violent trauma, are effectively immortal.

Further information: Elder Things are genderless creatures that reproduce asexually through spores that are raised by families of likeminded individuals rather than blood-relations. Their society is focused on large open spaces adorned by artwork and cylindrical furniture in pentagonal and other strange geometric structures. Due to advanced genetic engineering technology, they are responsible for the creation of the sentient slave protoplasmic race known as the Shoggoths, which turned against the Elder Things in centuries past and nearly destroyed their civilization. Even so, the Elder Things still rely on slave labor to maintain their decadent lifestyles and refuse to do labor that is beneath them.
(Call of Cthulhu - Elder Things (Continued))
races.name: Elder Thing
